citation: Proclamation under the Monetary Penalties Enforcement (Transitional Arrangements and Consequential Amendments) Act 2007 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Monetary Penalties Enforcement (Transitional Arrangements and Consequential Amendments) Act 2007

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Monetary Penalties Enforcement (Transitional Arrangements and Consequential Amendments) Act 2007 fix 28 April 2008 as the day on which that Act commences.

31 March 2008

W. J. E. COX

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

D. E. LLEWELLYN

Minister for Justice

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 9 April 2008

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice.
